Plot: Two teens fall in love with each other and heroin. Tar has reasons for running away from home that run deep and sour, whereas Gemma, with her middle-class roots firmly on show, has a deep-rooted lust for adventure. Their first hit brings bliss, the next despair.
Characters: Jerry, Sal, David "Tar" Lawson, Gemma Brogan, Skolly, Vonny, Lily, Richard Hacket
